display_long_description:
**Feel the pulse of MASTERS OF LIGHT, an electrifying wave shooter where you harness unstoppable magic superpowers with 🤜HANDTRACKING 🤛**

"This game makes you feel like a total badass" Naysy

Conquer **36 levels** with unlimited replay, upgrade **5 superpowers**, climb the **leaderboards** and become a superhero, the ultimate Master of Light. Will you defeat your friend's scores and unlock all the **trophies**? ✨

[media]

"This game is a workout!" OtterWordly

Fight, workout and dance to our intense synthwave soundtrack while exploring breathtaking VR environments.

The galaxy needs you! Will you be strong enough to face what awaits you at the heart of the Black Hole?

"The hand tracking on this is CRAZY!" TigressX

** Need help with hand tracking? We got you covered! Watch our Youtube tutorials and join our discord to talk directly to the devs. We value your feedback and thoughts on future upgrades and DLCs! **


[media]

**Key features :**
- 2 ways to play : hand-tracking 🤌 or controllers 🎮
- 3 difficulty modes : easy 😀 / normal 😨 / hard 😱
- 5 superpowers to master and upgrade including freezing time! ⏳
- 7 types of enemies 👿
- 20 trophies to unlock 🏆
- 36 levels and unlimited replay to improve your score! ⚡️
- leaderboards 🥇
- We support bHaptics Full Body Haptic! Sense the magic in your own body 💥

💬 Available in English, Spanish, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese.
